name: Salomon Tech Amphib 4 Watershoes - Women's
description:
Roam between land and water with this evolved hybrid of shoe and sandal. The Techamphibian 4 blends the protection of a shoe with the lightweight comfort of a sandal. Wear it like a shoe, or drop the heel and wear it like a slip-on sandal.Upper is highly breathable, quick-drying mesh.Upper is made from 70% recycled plastic bottles.Liner is made from 40% coffee beans.Quicklace™ single-pull lacing system with lace pocket on tongue.Adjustable, convertible heels allow for use as shoes or slides.EnergyCell EVA midsole absorb the shocks of the trail.Non-marking Contagrip® FD rubber outsole has sipping for traction on wet and slippery surfaces.

        Sustainability
